message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product, and I believe it would be highly beneficial to you. I'm happy to offer it to you for $11,500. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your position, but $9,500 is quite a bit lower than I'm willing to go. Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
